SCTX:
Begin ThormoorTeleport

short nolore

; Disables Thormoor at the coast after the player leaves -- another version gets reenabled at Thirsk

if ( GetJournalIndex "BM_CursedCaptain" < 50 )
		Enable
endif

if ( GetJournalIndex BM_CursedCaptain >= 50 )
	if ( GetPCCell "Solstheim, Thormoor's Watch" == 0 )
		Disable
	endif
endif

End ThormoorTeleport
